name: 一号(One)
description:
The game process is not long, and the overall style is biased towards the future cyberpunk

In this cyberpunk City, you need to explore and find weapons to fight with the enemy. There are guns, knives and machine armour hidden in the map. After finding the machine armour, you can drive the machine armour to fight with the enemy. In the cyberpunk City, you will also explore the entrance to the next level. In this game, there are not only the level of the third person perspective, but also the level of the overlooking perspective, In the game, the main characters can scale their body size to enter some special places

The game is developed by one person, and this game will continue to be updated, because this may be my only personal game. At present, this is not the final version of this game, but the content in the pictures and videos has been put on the shelves, so you can play with confidence,

Because I really can't afford to buy those genuine materials. If I can buy those materials later, I will update and add a lot of content. At the price of 1.99 ￥, I will definitely let you buy more value for money
